channel.title: mp3 players on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in mp3 players on Konigi

item.title: Pacemaker Mobile MP3 DJ Device Gets a GUI Redesign
item.description: Pacemaker, the mobile MP3 DJ device that debuted last year with a 120 GB hard drive, is getting a 2.0 release this spring and offering an additional lower capacity 60 GB hard drive option, and a new user interface. I was enamored with this device and the way they could incorporate most of the possible mixer and track selection controls for 2 deck track mixing into a single, albeit large, handheld device with their original product UI.
